  <div class="container_12">

<div id="content-wrap" class="styleguide">

	<div id="top" class="container_12">
		<h2>Pay-as-you-go pricing</h2>
		<div class="grid_8">
			<p>Build flexible and scalable applications on our public cloud. And with <a href="/cloud">managed cloud</a>, choose the service level that best fits your needs: We can run your cloud ops for you, or be there to provide expertise and assistance when you need us. Either way, help is never more than a phone call awayâ24x7x365.</p>
			<p class="text11">Note: All monthly pricing is estimated based on 730 hours of service.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="grid_4 push_1">
			<div class="cloud-calc">
				<div class="cloud-calc-icon"><a href="/calculator"><img src="https://752f77aa107738c25d93-f083e9a6295a3f0714fa019ffdca65c3.ssl.cf1.rackcdn.com/cloud/public-pricing/calculator-icon.png"></a></div>
				<div class="cloud-calc-desc">See your total cost with our <a href="/calculator">all-in-one calculator</a>.</div>
				<div class="clear"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</div>

	<div id="selector" class="container_12">
		<div class="well" style="height:auto;">
			<ul class="four-columns list14">
			<li><a href="#cloud-servers" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Servers</a></li>
			<li><a href="#cloud-databases" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Databases</a></li>
			<li><a href="#cloud-backup" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Backup</a></li>
			<li><a href="#bandwidth" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Bandwidth</a></li>
			<li><a href="#cloud-files" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Files &amp; CDN</a></li>
			<li><a href="#cloud-block-storage" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Block Storage</a></li>
			<li><a href="#cloud-load-balancers" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Cloud Load Balancers</a></li>
			<li><a href="#discounts" data-dummy="anchor" class="cloud_down">Discounts</a></li>
			</ul>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<!-- This one is complicated so it gets further divided into sections -->
	<div id="cloud-servers" class="container_12">
		<h3>Cloud Servers</h3>
		<p><b>We don't offer infrastructure without service.</b> Your application needs more than just a high-performance, reliable cloud infrastructure. Achieving great business outcomes requires knowing how to run the most demanding workloads in a cost-effective way. That's why every account includes services and expertise, along with a high-performance, reliable, and secure cloud infrastructure.</p>
		<p><b>Pricing is a combination of infrastructure and service level.</b></p>
		<p>Choose the <b>service level</b> that's right for your business needs (you can also change service levels as your business needs change):</p>
		<div class="grid_1"><img src="https://752f77aa107738c25d93-f083e9a6295a3f0714fa019ffdca65c3.ssl.cf1.rackcdn.com/cloud/public-pricing/managed-infra-sl-icon.png"></div>
		<div class="grid_11">
			<h4>Managed Infrastructure</h4>
			<p>If you prefer to do the labor yourself, we'll help you get set up and be there whenever you need us. We'll provide architecture advice and guidance, code development assistance, and launch managersâall with 24x7x365 support. Pricing is a total of raw infrastructure + the Managed Infrastructure rate, with a minimum service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$50</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£31</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$63</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬42</span>/mo after the first 30 days across all Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="grid_1"><img src="https://752f77aa107738c25d93-f083e9a6295a3f0714fa019ffdca65c3.ssl.cf1.rackcdn.com/cloud/public-pricing/managed-ops-sl-icon.png"></div>
		<div class="grid_11">
			<h4>Managed Operations: SysOps</h4>
			<p>Let us help manage your entire cloud ops for you. Including all the benefits of Managed Infrastructure, plus monitoring, OS maintenance/patching, application maintenance, and moreâwe'll do the heavy lifting for you. Pricing is a total of raw infrastructure + the Managed Operations rate, with a minimum service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£307</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$625</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬424</span>/mo across all Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="grid_1"><img src="https://752f77aa107738c25d93-f083e9a6295a3f0714fa019ffdca65c3.ssl.cf1.rackcdn.com/cloud/public-pricing/managed-devops-sl-icon.png"></div>
		<div class="grid_11">
			<h4>Managed Operations: DevOps Automation</h4>
			<p>Including the benefits of both Managed Infrastructure and Managed Operations: SysOps, we'll also automate your application environment by <a href="/devops/automation-service">treating your infrastructure as code</a>. Pricing is a total of raw infrastructure + the Managed Operations rate (without minimum service charge) + a <span data-currency="USD" >$2,500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£1,534</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$3,125</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬2,119</span>/mo flat fee. This service level option automatically qualifies for a <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume discount</a> on Cloud Server usage.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<p>The more you spend, the more you can save with <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume and commitment discounts</a> on Cloud Servers.</p>
		<p>Service level rates and minimums apply only when you use Cloud Servers.</p>
		<p><a href="/cloud/compare-service-levels" class="button button_medium rs_prod_gray">Compare Service Levels</a></p>
		<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
		

<div data-token-replace="rs_pricing_tables:cloud-server-pricing">

      <div class="container_12">
      <h3>General Purpose</h3>
      <ul class="checks14">
                  <li>High-performance, RAID 10-protected SSD storage</li>
          <li>Redundant 10-Gigabit networking</li>
          <li>Option of booting fromÂ Cloud Block StorageÂ (additional charges
            apply for Cloud Block Storage)
          </li>
          <li>Disk I/O up to ~35,000 4K random read IOPS and ~35,000 4K random
            write IOPS*
          </li>
              </ul>
      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
      <div id="dd-wrap-genv1" class="dd-wrap">
        <div class="dd-wrap-column dd-wrap-column-os">
          <div class="dd-wrap-label">OS</div>
          <div class="dd-wrap-center">
            <select class="pricing-table-select-os"
                    data-level="genv1">
                              <option
                  value="linux">Linux</option>
                              <option
                  value="windows">Windows</option>
                              <option
                  value="mssql-web">Windows + SQL Web</option>
                              <option
                  value="mssql-standard">Windows + SQL Standard</option>
                              <option
                  value="redhat">Red Hat Enterprise Linux</option>
                              <option
                  value="vyatta">Vyatta vRouter</option>
                          </select>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dd-wrap-column  dd-wrap-column-lvl">
          <div class="dd-wrap-label">Service Level</div>
          <div class="dd-wrap-center">
            <select class="pricing-table-select-service"
                    data-level="genv1">
              <option value="inf">Managed Infrastructure</option>
              <option value="sys">Managed Operations: SysOps</option>
              <option value="dev">Managed Operations: DevOps Automation</option>
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dd-wrap-column  dd-wrap-column-time">
          <div class="dd-wrap-label">Display</div>
          <div class="dd-wrap-center">
            <select class="pricing-table-select-time"
                    data-level="genv1">
              <option>hourly</option>
              <option>monthly</option>
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="clear"></div>
      </div>
      <div class="clear"></div>
    </div>

    <div class="grid_break_20"></div>

    <div class="container container_12">
      <div class="horizontal-scroll">
                <table class="cloud-pricing-table"  data-currency="USD">
        <thead>
        <tr class="pricing-row-pgenv1">
          <th class="nowrap">Name</th>
          <th class="nowrap">RAM</th>
          <th class="nowrap">vCPUs<sup><a href="#num1" data-dummy="anchor"
                                          class="white nounderline">1</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">System Disk<sup><a href="#num2" data-dummy="anchor"
                                                class="white nounderline">2</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Data Disk<sup><a href="#num3" data-dummy="anchor"
                                              class="white nounderline">3</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Bandwidth<sup><a href="#num4" data-dummy="anchor"
                                              class="white nounderline">4</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Raw Infrastructure</th>
          <th class="nowrap">&nbsp;</th>
          <th
            class="nowrap pricing-col pricing-col-inf pricing-col-monthly pricing-col-hourly">
            Managed Infrastructure
          </th>
          <th
            class="nowrap pricing-col pricing-col-sys pricing-col-monthly pricing-col-hourly">
            Managed Operations:<br/>SysOps
          </th>
          <th
            class="nowrap pricing-col pricing-col-dev pricing-col-monthly pricing-col-hourly">
            Managed Operations:<br/>DevOps Automation
          </th>
        </tr>
        </thead>

            </div>
      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-inf">The Managed Infrastructure service
        level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$50</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£31</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$63</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬42</span> across all Cloud
        Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-sys">The Managed Operations: SysOps
        service level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£307</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$625</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬424</span> across all
        Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-dev">The Managed Operations: DevOps
        Automation service level has an additional monthly flat fee of <span data-currency="USD" >$2,500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£1,534</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$3,125</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬2,119</span>        and automatically qualifies for a <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume discount</a> on Cloud Server usage.</p>

      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
      <div class="container_12">
      <h3>Compute Optimized</h3>

                    <li>Boot fromÂ Cloud Block StorageÂ (additional charges apply for
              Cloud Block Storage)
            </li>
            <li>Redundant 10-Gigabit networking</li>
                </ul>

              <table class="cloud-pricing-table" style="display:none;" data-currency="AUD">
        <thead>
        <tr class="pricing-row-pcpuv1">
          <th class="nowrap">Name</th>
          <th class="nowrap">RAM</th>
          <th class="nowrap">vCPUs<sup><a href="#num1" data-dummy="anchor"
                                          class="white nounderline">1</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">System Disk<sup><a href="#num2" data-dummy="anchor"
                                                class="white nounderline">2</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Data Disk<sup><a href="#num3" data-dummy="anchor"
                                              class="white nounderline">3</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Bandwidth<sup><a href="#num4" data-dummy="anchor"
                                              class="white nounderline">4</a></sup>
          </th>
          <th class="nowrap">Raw Infrastructure</th>
          <th class="nowrap">&nbsp;</th>
          <th

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-inf">The Managed Infrastructure service
        level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$50</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£31</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$63</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬42</span> across all Cloud
        Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-sys">The Managed Operations: SysOps
        service level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£307</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$625</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬424</span> across all
        Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-dev">The Managed Operations: DevOps
        Automation service level has an additional monthly flat fee of <span data-currency="USD" >$2,500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£1,534</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$3,125</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬2,119</span>        and automatically qualifies for a <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume discount</a> on Cloud Server usage.</p>

      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
      <div class="container_12">
      <h3>I/O Optimized</h3>
      <ul class="checks14">
                      <li>High-performance, RAID 10-protected SSD storage</li>
              <li>Option of booting fromÂ Cloud Block StorageÂ (additional charges
                apply for Cloud Block Storage)
              </li>
              <li>Redundant 10-Gigabit networking</li>
              <li>Disk I/O scales with the number of data disks up to ~80,000 4K
                random read IOPS and ~70,000 4K random write IOPS.*
              </li>
                  </ul>
      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
      <div id="dd-wrap-iov1" class="dd-wrap">
        <div class="dd-wrap-column dd-wrap-column-os">
          <div class="dd-wrap-label">OS</div>

                  value="vyatta">Vyatta vRouter</option>

            </div>
      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-inf">The Managed Infrastructure service
        level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$50</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£31</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$63</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬42</span> across all Cloud
        Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-sys">The Managed Operations: SysOps
        service level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£307</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$625</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬424</span> across all
        Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-dev">The Managed Operations: DevOps
        Automation service level has an additional monthly flat fee of <span data-currency="USD" >$2,500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£1,534</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$3,125</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬2,119</span>        and automatically qualifies for a <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume discount</a> on Cloud Server usage.</p>

      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="grid_break_40"></div>

              <table class="cloud-pricing-table" style="display:none;" data-currency="EUR">
        <thead>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-inf">The Managed Infrastructure service
        level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$50</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£31</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$63</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬42</span> across all Cloud
        Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-sys">The Managed Operations: SysOps
        service level has a minimum monthly service charge of <span data-currency="USD" >$500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£307</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$625</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬424</span> across all
        Cloud Servers (virtual and bare metal).</p>

      <p class="pricing-dis pricing-dis-dev">The Managed Operations: DevOps
        Automation service level has an additional monthly flat fee of <span data-currency="USD" >$2,500</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£1,534</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$3,125</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬2,119</span>        and automatically qualifies for a <a href="/cloud/servers/discounts">volume discount</a> on Cloud Server usage.</p>

      <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
  
  <div data-token-replace="rs_pricing_tables:cloud-onmetal-pricing">

<!-- Dropdown -->
<div class="container_12">
    <h3>OnMetal</h3>
    <div class="grid_break"></div><div class="grid_break"></div>
    <div id="dd-wrap-onmetal" class="dd-wrap">
        <div class="dd-wrap-column dd-wrap-column-os">
            <div class="dd-wrap-label">
                Linux
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dd-wrap-column  dd-wrap-column-lvl">
            <div class="dd-wrap-label">Service Level</div>
            <div class="dd-wrap-center">
                <select class="pricing-table-select-service" data-level="onmetal">
                    <option value="inf">Managed Infrastructure</option>
                    <option value="sys">Managed Operations: SysOps</option>
                    <option value="dev">Managed Operations: DevOps Automation</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dd-wrap-column  dd-wrap-column-time">
            <div class="dd-wrap-label">Display</div>
            <div class="dd-wrap-center">
                <select class="pricing-table-select-time" data-level="">
                    <option>hourly</option>
                    <option>monthly</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="clear"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="clear"></div>
</div>

<div class="grid_break"></div><div class="grid_break"></div>

<div class="container container_12">
  <div class="horizontal-scroll">
        <table class="cloud-pricing-table"  data-currency="USD">
      <thead>
      <tr class="pricing-row-onmetal">
          <th>Name</th>
          <th>RAM</th>
          <th>Core</th>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<div class="container_12">
		<div class="grid_12" style="text-align:right">
			<a href="#top" data-dummy="anchor"></a>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<div id="cloud-files" class="container_river">
		<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
		<div class="container_12">
			<h3>Cloud Files &amp; CDN</h3>
			<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
			<div class="grid_6">
                <h4>Storage</h4>
                <p>Pay less per GB when you store more files and media. Tiered pricing applies to your total Cloud Files usage per account across all US regions.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="grid_6 push_1">
                <h4>CDN Bandwidth</h4>
                <p>Tiered pricing applies to your aggregate CDN bandwidth usage per account across all US regions. The more you use, the more you save. (Note: CDN for Cloud Files is unrelated to <a href="/cloud/cdn-content-delivery-network">Rackspace CDN</a>, a separate offering with its own pricing model.)</p>
            </div>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            
<div data-token-replace="rs_pricing_tables:cloud-files-pricing">

<div class="clear"></div>

</div>

		<p><strong>Storage Price</strong>: <span data-token-fill="rs_price:cloud-db-storage-rate"><span data-currency="USD" >$0.75/GB/month</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£0.46/GB/month</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$0.94/GB/month</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬0.64/GB/month</span></span></p>
		<p><strong>CPU Weight</strong>: Higher is better, with the instance receiving more time on the CPU on the basis of its weight under high load.</p>
		<p><strong>Network</strong>: Guaranteed network throughput allocation.</p>
		<p><strong>TPS (Transactions per second)</strong>: Benchmark (June 2014) in transactions per second using 64 MySQL threads for all flavors, except 32 threads for 512MB.</p>
		<p><sup>*</sup>Your mileage may vary. A benchmark is only a guideline and not representative of the performance your application will see. Always benchmark your own application.</p>
		
    	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

<p><small>US data center rates are shown.</small></p>

    	    <p><strong>Availability</strong>: US and UK data centers only.</p>
    	    <p>High Availability Instance pricing will become active December 1, 2015.</p>
    		<p><strong>Storage Price</strong>: <span data-token-fill="rs_price:cloud-db-storage-rate"><span data-currency="USD" >$0.75/GB/month</span><span data-currency="GBP" style="display:none;">Â£0.46/GB/month</span><span data-currency="AUD" style="display:none;">A$0.94/GB/month</span><span data-currency="EUR" style="display:none;">â¬0.64/GB/month</span></span></p>
    		<p><strong>CPU Weight</strong>: Higher is better, with the instance receiving more time on the CPU on the basis of its weight under high load.</p>
    		<p><strong>Network</strong>: Allocated network throughput.</p>
    		<p><strong>TPS (Transactions per second)</strong>: Benchmark (June 2014) in transactions per second using 64 MySQL threads for all flavors, except 32 threads for 512MB.</p>
    		<p><sup>*</sup>Your mileage may vary. A benchmark is only a guideline and not representative of the performance your application will see. Always benchmark your own application.</p>

	</div>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<div class="container_12">
		<div class="grid_12" style="text-align:right">
			<a href="#top" data-dummy="anchor"></a>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="grid_break"></div>

	<div id="cloud-block-storage" class="container_river">
		<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
		<div class="container_12">

			<p class="text11">* These products are billed monthly.</p>
            <div class="grid_break_40"></div>
            <p><strong>Incoming &amp; internal &mdash;</strong>No charge for incoming bandwidth, or for bandwidth within private networks (<a href="/knowledge_center/frequently-asked-question/what-is-servicenet">ServiceNet</a> and <a href="/cloud/networks/">Cloud Networks</a>).</p>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<div class="container_12">
		<div class="grid_12" style="text-align: right">
			<a href="#top" data-dummy="anchor"></a>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="grid_break"></div>


	<div id="discounts" class="container_river">
		<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
		<div class="container_12">
			<h3>Discounts</h3>
			<div class="clear"></div>
			<p>The more you spend, the more you can save with volume and commitment discounts for Cloud Servers. The discounts apply to your monthly aggregated spend on all flavors of Cloud Servers within the US. You get the freedom and flexibility to switch flavors and US regions without changing your discount eligibility.</p>
			<h4>Volume Discount: <span class="normal">Spend more and save</span></h4>
			<ul class="list16">
			<li>No need to applyâyou're automatically eligible when you spend over $5,000/month on Cloud Servers usage.</li>
			<li>The more you spend, the higher your savings.</li>
			<li>To provide the greatest savings, we aggregate your Cloud Servers spend by account across all flavors and US <a href="/about/datacenters">regions</a>.</li>
			<li>There is no term commitment. Read the complete <a href="/information/legal/volumediscount">Terms &amp; Conditions</a> for our volume discount.</li>
			</ul>
			<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
			<h4>Commitment Discount: <span class="normal">Commit to a term, save even more</span></h4>
			<p>Commit to spend at least $5,000/month on Cloud Servers usage for a specified term to increase your savings. You have the flexibility to choose a term of 6, 12, 18, 24, or 36 months. To get started, <a href="#subnav-contact-webform" class="fancybox">apply now</a>.</p>
			<ul class="list16">
			<li>The higher your commitment amount, the greater your savings.</li>
			<li>The longer your commitment term, the greater your savings.</li>
			<li>To provide the greatest savings, we aggregate your Cloud Servers spend by account across all flavors and US <a href="/about/datacenters">regions</a>.</li>
			<li>You will receive a volume discount for any spend in excess of your commitment amount.</li>
			</ul>
			<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
			<h4>Prepayment discount: Prepay for the entire term, save the most</h4>
			<p>To get started, <a href="#subnav-contact-webform" class="fancybox">apply now</a>.</p>
			<ul>
			<li>If you choose to prepay your total committed amount for a term, you can enjoy the maximum savings.</li>
			<li>You will receive a volume discount for any spend in excess of the prepayment amount.</li>
			<li>To provide the greatest savings, we aggregate your Cloud Servers spend by account across all flavors and US <a href="/about/datacenters">regions</a>.</li>
			</ul>
			<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

		<div class="container_12">
			<div class="grid_12" style="text-align: right">
				<a href="#top" data-dummy="anchor"></a>
			</div>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>
	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

	<div id="cta" class="container_12 centered">
		<p class="text16">Create an account for on-demand access to our managed cloud.</p>
		<p><a href="https://cart.rackspace.com/cloud?cp_id=public_cloud" class="button button_large rs_prod_green">Sign Up Now</a></p>
	</div>

	<div class="grid_break_40"></div>

</div></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
</div>
  </div>
</div>
  </div>
